author: Tom Hennigan
title: Coronavirus: Approval secured to fly home Irish stranded in Peru
description: Around 135 citizens seeking way out of South American country amid pandemic restrictions
content:
The Government has been given approval to send a repatriation flight to Peru to pick up more than 100 Irish citizens who are stranded as a result of restrictions introduced in response to the coronavirus pandemic. 
The Department of Foreign Affairs said in a… [+4112 chars]
